Detailed Description

cvmx_cpri::_rx_buf_thres

This register specifies thresholds for the receiver buffer fill level. When the buffer level goes beyond either fill level, it will re-align to the level specified by CPRI()_RX_DELAY_CTRL[RX_BUF_INT_DELAY].

Automatic resynchronization events are counted in CPRI(0..5)_RX_BUF_RESYNC_CNT.

Buffer levels are specified in 32-bit decoded words (i.e., after 8b/10b decoding).
